comment.author: 90851177@N00
comment._content: An eerie shot - the fading with time adds a certain poignancy to the smiles on the faces of these men - can't help but wonder what happened to them on that day... -- Seen on your photo stream. (?²ˣ)

comment.author: 38587782@N07
comment._content:
my great grandad was there that day, he died on the first day of the landings, we dont have a photos of him in his uniform...
very sad plan to go to the anzac day service in turkey next year.

comment.author: 21042651@N08
comment._content: The smiles on those young faces strike at my heart...  The events of Gallipoli still throw up a howl of pain in so many of us.
